titleStmt.title: An Act of Common-Councell made the first day of July in the yeare of our Lord 1658 for the better rule, oversight and government of the carrs, carts, carters or carmen within the city of London, and liberties of the same.
titleStmt.author: City of London (England).

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in the Guildhall, London.
